query: SELECT column_name, column_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = 'sales';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3p9fhY9wEnC59QX.root --database kez2oyxfSHFekZFiUAQt4p --execute SELECT column_name, column_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = 'sales';
stdout:
column_name	column_type
id	int(11)
userId	int(11)
productName	varchar(255)
productCategory	varchar(100)
quantity	int(11)
unitPrice	decimal(10,2)
totalAmount	decimal(12,2)
saleDate	timestamp
customerName	varchar(255)
orderReference	varchar(100)
createdAt	timestamp
saleType	enum('online','pos')
paymentGateway	varchar(100)
emailMarketing	varchar(50)
